DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of 2012-2013 trivalent seasonal influenza vaccine in 60 healthy infants aged 6-35 months old, 60 healthy adults aged 18-60 years old, and 60 healthy older people aged > 60 years.
DOC.brief_title: The Immunogenicity and Safety of 2012-2013 Trivalent Seasonal Influenza Vaccine
